div.a: Food Pick-Up Form - Central Columbia Elementary School location (only).

span.p: We will provide food to those who come to the Elementary School on the following pick up days between 11:00a.m and 12:00p.m.

p.br:
Monday April 20th Wednesday April 22nd
Monday April 27th Wednesday April 29th

Monday May 4th Wednesday May 6th
Monday May 11th Wednesday May 13th
Monday May 18th Wednesday May 20th
Tuesday May 26th Thursday May 28th

Central Columbia School District is providing technical support for our K to 12 students who are completing their school assignments from home.

ul.li: Submit your issue via the HelpDesk - Technology (Students) link found on any district web page under 'Quick Links'.
Or, send an email directly to HelpDesk@ccsd.cc
Or, Call the District, 570-784-2850, Tech Help Voice Mail Extension 5050. Leave a detailed message.

div.h1: Central Columbia’s Career Pathway HS is FREE for all Central Columbia SD and Surrounding Areas

p.a: Central Columbia’s Career Pathway High School is FREE of charge to parents for all students in Central Columbia School District and Surrounding Areas.

ul.li: Four-year programs, Agriculture Operations, and Agriculture Mechanization, Medical Sciences

div.div: Central Columbia School District | 4777 Old Berwick Road | Bloomsburg, PA 17815

td.p: The Central Columbia School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability or age in its programs or activities. Inquiries may be directed to the Title IX Coordinator or the Section 504/ADA Title II Coordinator at 4777 Old Berwick Road, Bloomsburg, PA 17815 or (570) 784-2850 ext. 4043.
